recordId.title: recordId
recordId.description: The Record ID to generate tasks and events for (Account, Opportunity, Case, etc.). This should be extracted from the user's context or request.

activityCount.title: activityCount
activityCount.description: The number of activities (tasks and events) to generate (e.g., 3, 5, 10). Extract this from user phrases like 'Generate 5 activities', 'Create 3 tasks', 'Make 8 activities'.

industry.title: industry
industry.description: The industry type for generating relevant activities (e.g., 'automotive', 'healthcare', 'fintech', 'retail', 'manufacturing', 'luxury hotels'). Extract this from user phrases like 'automotive industry', 'healthcare sector', 'fintech activities'.
